p: Palm rosa oil took 90 min for 100% inhibition of E. coli and X. oryzae, while it took 45 min for 100 % inhibition of S. aureus ( Figure 5a–c). In both the above cases the lethal activity was observed from 15 min. The eucalyptus oil took 150 min for 100% inhibition of E. coli. In presence of eucalyptus oil there was no drastic reduction in colony forming units (CFU) of E. coli for the first 30 min. The essential oil of geranium took 150 min for 100% inhibition of E. Coli, 120 min for X. oryzae and 75 min for S. aureus. The essential oil of citronella took 195 min for E. Coli, 150 min and 120 min for X. Oryzae and S. aureus respectively for 100% inhibition ( Figure 6a–c). Among the major components citral showed a very fast activity. It showed 100% inhibition of E. coli, X. oryzae and S. aureus in 105 min, 90 min and 45 min respectively ( Figure 7a–c).
